description:
Kenshiro struggles against Kemda. But then the mysterious Rei appears, a man who dresses as a woman to lure in villains and slaughter them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanto Suichouken! Tsuyosugita Otoko-tachi no Higeki ga Hajimatta!!
South Star Waterfowl Fist! The Beginning of a Tragedy of Men Too Strong!!
南斗水鳥拳! 強すぎた 男たちの悲劇が始まった!!
